frontmatter.description:
This interface is:
obsolete and has not been superseded.
nonfunctional in SOLIDWORKS 2008 and later.
Use the interfaces related to
motion studies
introduced in SOLIDWORKS 2008 to access animation and simulation.

title: ISimulation
description:
This interface is:
obsolete and has not been superseded.
nonfunctional in SOLIDWORKS 2008 and later.
Use the interfaces related to
motion studies
introduced in SOLIDWORKS 2008 to access animation and simulation.
